data.name: Sample - NetBox - 1.0.0
data.description: NetBox is the leading solution for modeling and documenting modern networks. By combining the traditional disciplines of IP address management (IPAM) and datacenter infrastructure management (DCIM) with powerful APIs and extensions, NetBox provides the ideal "source of truth" to power network automation.

workflows.description: Get a list of IP address objects in your NetBox instance.
workflows.name: Get IP Address List

workflows.description: Retrieve a detail view of IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID.
workflows.name: Get IP Address

workflows.description: Update a IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID and other parameters.
workflows.name: Update IP Address

workflows.description: Delete an IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID.
workflows.name: Delete IP Address

workflows.description: Get a list of IP address Prefix objects in your NetBox instance. A prefix might be represented as "192.168.1.0/24." Here, "192.168.1.0" is the network address, and "/24" denotes the subnet mask
workflows.name: Get Prefix List

workflows.description: Retrieve a detail view of Prefix object from your NetBox instance based on given Prefix ID.
workflows.name: Get Prefix

workflows.description: Update a Prefix object from your NetBox instance based on given Prefix ID and other parameters.
workflows.name: Update Prefix

workflows.description: Delete a Prefix object from your NetBox instance based on given Prefix ID.
workflows.name: Delete Prefix

workflows.description: Get a list of all Virtual Machines associated with your NetBox instance.
workflows.name: Get Virtual Machines List

workflows.description: Retrieve a detail view of Virtual Machine from your NetBox instance based on given VM ID.
workflows.name: Get Virtual Machine

workflows.description: Update a VM object from your NetBox instance based on given VM ID and other parameters.
workflows.name: Update Virtual Machine

workflows.description: Delete a VM object from your NetBox instance based on given VM ID.
workflows.name: Delete Virtual Machine

workflows.description: Get a list of all Racks associated with your NetBox instance. A Rack refers to a physical or virtual representation of a rack-mounted equipment
workflows.name: Get Rack List

workflows.description: Retrieve a detail view of Rack object from your NetBox instance based on given Rack ID.
workflows.name: Get Rack

workflows.description: Update a Rack object from your NetBox instance based on given Rack ID and other parameters.
workflows.name: Update Rack

workflows.description: Delete a Rack object from your NetBox instance based on given Rack ID.
workflows.name: Delete Rack

workflows.description: Get a list of all Devices associated with your NetBox instance. A Device refers to the various pieces of equipment or hardware that make up a network or data center infrastructure.
workflows.name: Get Devices List

workflows.description: Retrieve a detail view of Device object from your NetBox instance based on given Device ID.
workflows.name: Get Device

workflows.description: Update a Device object from your NetBox instance based on given Device ID and other parameters.
workflows.name: Update Device

workflows.description: Delete a Device object from your NetBox instance based on given Device ID.
workflows.name: Delete Device

workflows.description: Get a list of all Cables associated with your NetBox instance. Cables represent the links between different devices or interfaces within a network infrastructure and are used to denote how devices are interconnected.
workflows.name: Get Cables List

workflows.description: Retrieve a detail view of Cable object from your NetBox instance based on given Cable ID.
workflows.name: Get Cable

workflows.description: Update a Cable object from your NetBox instance based on given Cable ID and other parameters.
workflows.name: Update Cable

workflows.description: Delete a Cable object from your NetBox instance based on given Cable ID.
workflows.name: Delete Cable
